title: Sadio Mane says he wants to stay at Liverpool ‘forever’
text:
Sadio Mane is keen to see out his career at Liverpool (TV2)

Sadio Mane claims he wants to stay at Liverpool ‘forever’.

The Senegal international is currently in his fourth season at Anfield after he signed in a £34 million deal from Southampton in 2016.

Mane has been heavily linked with a move to Real Madrid following his impressive performances for Jurgen Klopp’s side.

But the 27-year-old admits he is keen to see out his career at Anfield.

‘I’ve been at a few clubs in the world but Liverpool is unique,’ Mane told TV2.

Mane has become a key part of Liverpool’s attack (PA Wire)

‘I think here is a little bit like family.

‘The mood is always incredible.

Advertisement

‘But that is normal, we have been together for four years and know each other well.

‘We are also together outside games and training, and that is important for morale.

‘I always enjoy being here. Forever… hopefully.’
